entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
